Class PathMoverManager

java.lang.Object
  simkit.BasicSimEventSource
      simkit.BasicSimEntity
          simkit.SimEntityBase
              seadiver.PathMoverManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<simkit.SimEntity>, MoverManager, simkit.Named, simkit.PropertyChangeSource, simkit.SimEntity, simkit.SimEventListener, simkit.SimEventSource
public class PathMoverManager
extends simkit.SimEntityBase
implements MoverManager

Modified from original file in diskit to allow for continuing moving from first waypoint when last waypoint reached.

Author:
ahbuss
